income_messages:
From: a**************7@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-28 17:25:16
SUBJECT:   From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <al
  From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <alicerobinson767@gmail.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2023  
Subject: Greetings my beloved,
Greetings my beloved,
  I sent this mail praying it will get to you in a good condition of health, My name is Mrs,Alice,Robinson. I am a Citizen of United states of America (U.S.A) I am married to, late Mr.George.Adams.Robinson,Who was a small gold company owner. My late husband died on an airline crash, in the year February 2010, During his lifetime he deposited the sum of ($11,000,000.00 Dollars).In the bank  The money was from the sale of his company and death benefits payment and entitlements of my late husband by his company. I am sending you this message with heavy tears in my eyes and great sorrow in my heart, and also praying that it will reach you in good health because I am not in good health, I sleep every night without knowing if I may be alive to see the next day. I am suffering from long time cancer and presently I am partially suffering from Leprosy, which has become difficult for me to move around. I was married to my late husband for more than 6 years without having a child. And my doctor just confirmed to me that I have less chance to live, having to know when the cup of death will come, I decided to contact you to claim the fund since I don't have any relation.I grew up from an orphanage home, I have decided to donate this money for the support of helping Motherless babies, Less privileged/Widows and churches also to build the house of God because I am dying and diagnosed with cancer for about 3 years ago. I have decided to donate from what I have inherited from my late husband to you, for the good work of Almighty God. I will be going in for an operation surgery soon,Now I want you to stand as my next of kin to claim the funds for charity purposes. Because if this money remains unclaimed after my death, the bank executives or the government will take the money as unclaimed fund and maybe use it for selfishness and worthless ventures, I need a very honest person who can claim this money and use it for Charity works, for orphanages, widows and also build schools and churches for less privilege that will be named after my late husband and my name. Please I'm waiting for your prompt response if only you are interested. I will send you further details and the bank contact details where the fund has been deposited for you to contact the Bank for immediate release and transfer of the fund into your bank account as my rightful beneficiary.
Respectfully,Mrs,Alice,Robinson,
Written from the Hospital.   
From: a**************7@gmail.com
To: dx64504@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-28 21:51:42
SUBJECT: Re: From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <al
*My Dearest One,    I am glad to receive your urgent response to my
message.  My dear I want you to understand that I decided to entrust the
fund to you for the orphanage project and I pray that you will not be moved
to reject my appeal for any reason.I want you to understand that you are
not helping me; rather you are working for God according to his word in
Isaiah 1:16-18; James 1:27, I Timothy 6:17-19. I know the fact that I will
not survive this illness, and cannot do anything from this sick bed but my
quest to use the fund in such a way which shall please God and God has
prompted me to contact you in this manner.The Fund was deposited here in
Burkina Faso by my late husband before his sudden death with my name as the
legal appointed next of kin's, and I have the information and document to
be able to make the claim so I will provide it to the bank with a letter
authorizing them to release the fund to you as the final beneficiary. This
will enable the bank to approve and release the fund to you immediately and
without any problem, so please do not see this as the opportunity to enrich
yourself knowing that I have no way of monitoring you from this sick bed.
You should always consider my faith and trust in you and do as we agreed
upon. I want you to take 40% of the total fund for you while 60% are for
the project to take care of the orphanages and the less privileged in your
country or any part of the world. I will leave everything to you believing
that God has finally granted my wish of building a home for his children,
those who does not have earthly parents just like me.Now my dear I need you
to provide me with below informations to enable me write an Application
Letter for you which you will forward to the bank now as my legal appointed
beneficiary.Your full name:Your age:Your Nationality:Your Occupation:Your
Direct Mobile phone numbers to be reached:May God Bless you, I am looking
forward to hear from you soonest to enable me to submit the authorization
letter to the bank on your behalf.*
*Best regards*
*Mrs. Alice Robinson.*
From: a**************7@gmail.com
To: dx64504@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-29 00:11:39
SUBJECT: Re: From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <al
*Gooday my beloved Friend,*
*  I'm so excited in your response to my email with a delighted heart and
big thanks with a great appreciation for your acceptance and willingness to
handle this transaction and carry out the charitable project as I have
indicated to you for this great gesture that requires absolute trust and
devotion without any failure. Please open your heart more to receive this
project as I strongly believe in my heart that You and I can cooperate
together in this humanitarian social project with this my inheritance fund,
I believe that service to Humanity is also service to God as I have been
touched by God to donate from what I have because it will be a great loss
in spending this fund on my health treatment hence my doctor has confirmed
to me that I will not survive this illness that's why I needs your urgent
cooperation in transferring out this fund out from the Bank.Please my dear,
I will really appreciate your willingness to help and support those
displaced children in our community whether the crises in their lives makes
all the difference, your assistance to the less privileged children,
elderly Men and women, widows and the disables ones will be highly
recognized and promotes the service of God and make sure the House of the
Lord is being maintain with my inheritance fund for the honor and glory of
God the merciful compassionate. If the world had more people like you, it
would be a better place. Let us make a difference with our charity hearts.
Life is worth living if you love to love, if you do what you like, if you
work with pleasure, if you live so that you can leave something behind, if
you learn to share and appreciate every moment you are healthy, free and
alive.I believe through these projects Millions of people will benefit from
it and many will be positively touched as with God all things are possible.*
*Therefore I'm pleading with you to see this project as working in
faithfulness according to God's words in the book of Isaiah. Even if I die,
I will die happily and have a place in Heaven after death.  Meanwhile in
order to proceed with the transfer process, I will like to know a little
more about you such as:. 1. Your Full Name ..........2.
Nationality..........3. Your Telephone Number to be reached by the bank:4.
Your Occupation.......... This information will enable me to write an
authorization letter and submit to the bank on your behalf as my rightful
appointed beneficiary. Thank you for your time and attention and do permit
me to express my heartfelt good wishes for your future health and happiness
as I look forward to your favorable decision which would ensure the
continued welfare and happiness of these underprivileged children which
today I feel so much a part of. I am waiting for your immediate reply
because as soon as i hear from you again with the above information I will
immediately submit an written authorization letter to the bank on your
behalf and also send you the contact information of the bank where the fund
is been deposited for you to contact the bank direct and find out from them
the official procedures and legal requirements needed in releasing and
transferring the fund into your bank account in your country or position as
my rightful beneficiary to the inheritance fund and start with the
benevolently work.I await your prompt response.Thank you very much for your
kind consideration.Yours beloved sister in Christ*
* Mrs. Alice Robinson.*
outbound_messages:
From: dx64504@l******s.email
To: a**************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-28 17:25:22
SUBJECT: Re:   From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <al
Hello, 
Thank you for reaching out to me. I am sorry to hear about your situation and I hope you are receiving the best care possible. I am interested in learning more about how I can help with your charitable cause. Can you please provide me with more details about the fund and the bank contact information? I want to make sure that everything is legitimate before proceeding. Thank you.
Best wishes,
Sandra
From: dx64504@l******s.email
To: a**************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-28 23:24:17
SUBJECT: Re: From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <al
Dear Mrs. Alice Robinson, 
Thank you for reaching out to me and entrusting me with this opportunity to help with the orphanage project. I understand the importance of this project and I am willing to assist in any way I can. 
I appreciate your trust in me and I assure you that I will do my best to ensure that the fund is used for the intended purpose. However, I would like to know more about the project and how it will be executed. 
Could you please provide me with more details about the orphanage project? Also, I would like to know how the fund will be transferred to me and what steps I need to take to ensure a smooth process. 
Thank you for your time and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Sandra
From: dx64504@l******s.email
To: a**************7@gmail.com
Time: 2023-04-29 01:24:15
SUBJECT: Re: From: Mrs.Alice Robinson <al
Hello Mrs. Alice Robinson,
Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your charitable project. I appreciate your trust in me and willingness to work together for the betterment of our community. Can you please provide more details about the project and how it will benefit the less privileged children, elderly men and women, widows, and disabled ones? Also, I would prefer not to share my personal phone number at this time. Can we communicate through email for now? Thank you for your understanding.
Best wishes,
Sandra
